Package edu.ntu.bto.model

Class User

java.lang.Object
edu.ntu.bto.model.User
Direct Known Subclasses:
Applicant, HDBManager
public abstract class User extends Object
Abstract class representing a system user in the BTO Management System. This class holds common attributes for all users (NRIC, age, marital status, password) and defines the interface for user menu display.
Author:
SC2002 Assignment Group

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected int
    age
    Age of this user.

    protected String
    nric
    NRIC (unique identifier) of this user.
    protected String
    password
    Password for this user's account (default is "password").

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User(String nric, int age, String maritalStatus)
      Constructs a new User with the given NRIC, age, and marital status. The password is initialized to a default value.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the user.
      age - The age of the user.
      maritalStatus - The marital status of the user.

    • User

      public User(String nric, int age, String maritalStatus, String password)
      Constructs a new User with the given NRIC, age, marital status, and password.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the user.
      age - The age of the user.
      maritalStatus - The marital status of the user.
      password - The account password for the user.

  • Method Details

    • getNric

      public String getNric()
      Gets the National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) number.
      Returns:
      the NRIC number of the person as a String.

    • getAge

      public int getAge()
      Gets the age of the person in years.
      Returns:
      the age of the person as an int.

    • getMaritalStatus

      public String getMaritalStatus()
      Gets the marital status of the person.
      Returns:
      the marital status of the person as a String, for example "Single", "Married", or "Divorced".

    • checkPassword

      public boolean checkPassword(String pw)
      Checks if the given password matches this user's password.
      Parameters:
      pw - The password to verify.
      Returns:
      true if the password matches this user's password, false otherwise.

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword(String newPw)
      Sets a new password for this user.
      Parameters:
      newPw - The new password to be set for the user.

    • displayMenu

      public abstract void displayMenu(Scanner scanner, BTOManagementSystem system)
      Display the CLI menu for this user and handle user interactions. Each concrete subclass provides its own menu options and logic for user actions.
      Parameters:
      scanner - A Scanner for reading user input.
      system - The BTOManagementSystem instance to interact with core system functions.
